Protocols/AnyPredicate.html.name: AnyPredicate
Protocols/AnyPredicate.html.abstract: AnyPredicate represents a condition on an Any? element.

Protocols/GlobalStub.html.name: GlobalStub
Protocols/GlobalStub.html.abstract: GlobalStub represents an entity able to give a stub value.

Functions.html#/s:9MockSwift2eeopyAA9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements equal to rhs

Functions.html#/s:9MockSwift1gopyAA9Pred.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements more than rhs

Functions.html#/s:9MockSwift2geopyAA9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements more than or equal to rhs

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: any(_:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> able to match any value of type Input.

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: not(_:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> able to match any value of type Input not matched by an other predicate.

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: isTrue()
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Bool> that can match any Bool equal to true

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: isFalse()
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Bool> that can match any Bool equal to false

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: equalsTo(rhs:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements equal to rhs

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: moreThan(rhs:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements more than rhs

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: moreThanOrEqualsTo(rhs:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements more than or equal to rhs

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: lessThan(rhs:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements less than rhs

Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.name: lessThanOrEqualsTo(rhs:)
Classes/Predicate.html#/s:9MockSwift9Pre.abstract: Creates a Predicate<Input> that can match any elements less than or equal to rhs

Classes/VerifiableProperty/Readable.html.name: Readable
Classes/VerifiableProperty/Readable.html.abstract: Represents a property call that returns ReturnType and can be checked with read access only.

Classes/VerifiableProperty/Writable.html.name: Writable
Classes/VerifiableProperty/Writable.html.abstract: Represents a property call that returns ReturnType and can be checked with read and wirte access.

Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.name: receivedParameters
Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.abstract: Return a list of all parameters’ list with whom the function was called.

Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.name: callCount
Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.abstract: Return the number of times that the function was called.

Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.name: called(times:file:line:)
Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.abstract: Checks that the function has been called a number of times corresponding to the predicate.

Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.name: called(times:file:line:)
Classes/Verifiable.html#/s:9MockSwift10V.abstract: Checks that the function has been called.
